markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Implacable](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1373)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 80</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The effects of the implacable rune only activate when an enemy causes the effect to apply._

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto medium or heavy armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This substantial rune makes you difficult to hold back. Whenever you are affected by an effect that lasts until you [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (for instance, from the [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) action or a [tanglefoot bag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=78)), you become [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32). You can use the extra action each round only to Step or Escape.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Implacable
